text.KPI name and description: Equipment Support. The Contractor shall provide the following services, equipment management, equipment inspection, equipment maintenance and repair, equipment modification, vehicle recovery, field repair and recovery and armaments inspection. Stores and Engineer Resources. The Contractor shall provide the following services Authority equipment accounting and control. Authority equipment issuing. Stock repair and maintenance. Hazardous substance storage. Engineering resources accounting and inventory control. Engineering resources. Field Engineer resources. Engineer resources inspections. Maintenance, manufacture and repair. Modifications. Armaments Stores. Ammunition and stores. Clothing stores. Personal Clothing record, tailoring. Miscellaneous stores. Deceased personal effects. Absent without leave effects. MT. The Contractor shall provide the following services. Transport booking, Fuel card, FMT 600 Permit issuing, Accident and damage reporting, Passenger transport, Special goods transport, Staff car, Self-drive transport, Self-drive all-terrain vehicle, Self-drive dog transport.

text.Contract title and description: Facilities Management Asia Pacific
text.Supplier: Jones Lang LaSalle Property Consultants Pte Ltd
text.KPI name and description:
OP 02
   Percentage of actual Planned Services tasks undertaken vs scheduled to be undertaken as per agreed 52 week planner
text.Comments:
Performance continues to improve as does confidence in the integrity of the data provided. 
   OP 02 is currently subject to BAU governance discussions and activities to drive improvement form part of the Year 3 Innovation Plan.  We continue to see a gradual increase in scores.  This quarter the score is due to completion of old PPMs within March following a concerted effort to clear a backlog.  Dips are due to known issues in 1 or 2 locations out of 26 in total.  It should be noted that the target is a demanding one and the supplier is still delivering 97.7% of all PPM within schedule, an improvement on the last quarter.  Overdue PPM delivery is measured as a separate KPI.

text.Contract title and description: Test Operations Services (TOpS)
text.KPI name and description:
Helpdesk response to calls, enquiries and complaints

•  the abandoned call rate will not exceed 5% of the total calls each day 
•  at least 99% of inbound queries and complaints will be resolved within 5 Business Days 
•  100% of inbound enquiries and complaints will be resolved within 8 Business Days. 
•  85% of all enquiries must be resolved at first point of contact 
•  at least 99% of all complaints are acknowledged by email and forwarded (where appropriate) within 1 Business Day of receipt 
•  at least 99% of all complaints to the Helpdesk must be resolved within 15 Business Days of receipt 
•  100% of emails, faxes, and letters and text enquiries must be acknowledged within 1 Business Day of receipt 
•  availability of the Helpdesk as set out in Goal 12 in Schedule 4 (Services) Part 1 (Statement of Requirements)

KPI3 Overall progress of agreed work plan activities

text.Contract title and description: Human and Social Sciences Research Capability (HSSRC)
text.KPI name and description: Timeliness of a Deliverable: Deliverable received by required due date?
text.Comments: The Human and Social Sciences Research Capability (HSSRC) contractual reporting performance measure is not based on individual KPI scores, rather a combined score. The individual scores for each KPI is multiplied by the weighting for that KPI to give an overall score for each, which is added together to give a total score for the quarter. Due to the expiry of the framework on 11th March 2023 this KPI set does not cover a full quarter.

text.KPI name and description:
Fleet availability 

Percentage of time that each vehicle is available to Defra to utilise. Calculated by available hours based on a standard working day, Monday – Friday 08:00-17:00, against off road hours during the same period. Calculation looks at the average availability across all vehicles.

text.Contract title and description: PROVISION AND OPERATION OF A JOINT FORCES COMMAND AND STAFF COLLEGE-CP/PFI/101
text.KPI name and description: Estates Services: Management of Assets: To maintain the function of Private Finance Initiative (PFI) assets in accordance with the Contract. The PFI Assets include the Cormorant building which has teaching wings, residential living accommodation, office accommodation, lecture theatres and syndicate rooms to support education provision, 290 domestic housing for military staff, sports pavilions, sports fields, storage assets, car parks and infrastructure all of which has to be maintained.

text.Contract title and description: DIOCB6/023 HESTIA SOUTH REGION MULTI ACTIVITY CONTRACT
text.KPI name and description:
Soft FM Satisfaction
Intent - To monitor instances that contracted services have been delivered to a sub-standard quality (i.e. Service Satisfaction Failures)
Definition - Service Satisfaction Failure: An occurrence of poor/insufficient quality e.g. A contractor fails to provide appropriate waste receptacles for the volume and type of waste generated
text.Comments: Service Satisfaction performance was impacted by localised issues at three locations in February 2023. Labour shortages resulted in some service satisfaction failures reflecting difficult labour market conditions additional a short term supply chain problem reduced Waste services. Sodexo has taken remedial action and Service Satisfaction improved significantly at these sites in March.
